experience.description: Worked on building end-to-end AI products including resume-enhancement systems, multi-node chatbots, and automated job-apply agents. Designed vector-database pipelines for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), fine-tuned large language models, pre-trained small language models, and developed multi-agent workflows for scalable AI systems.

tech_used.Python: used for core AI development and automation
tech_used.LLMs: used for building intelligent conversational and reasoning systems
tech_used.SLMs: used for pre-training and lightweight AI deployments
tech_used.MCP: used for agent communication and control
tech_used.Playwright: used for browser automation in job-apply agents
tech_used.Qdrant: used as a vector database for RAG pipelines
tech_used.mem0: used for long-term memory management in agents

experience.description: Collaborated with a team to design and develop a fully functional company website to enhance online presence and user engagement. Developed a computer-based testing (CBT) platform enabling efficient test creation, management, and administration. Implemented features for test creation, test management, and result analysis.

tech_used.JavaScript: used for client-side logic and interactivity
tech_used.SQL: used for database management and queries
